Hey, guys,

I'm a novice here, and I need help with literally the simplest thing.  I'm making a game I want to start out looking like Zork 1, West of House and environs.  I want each In-Room Item description to be on its own line, and I cannot seem to figure out how to do that.

I've gone to game > Room Descriptions and removed Object and Exit lists by setting them to 0.  I only want exits and rooms defined by descriptions, as is the case with Zork 1.

In the In-Room Description section of each object, I can't seem to add a full return either before or after the description.

Thanks, I appreciate it.

I'm not really understanding.

The game >> room description tab is for setting things like the hyperlinks, whether you want the 'You are in..' prefix, etc.

For the actual room description itself, create a 'new room', then 'room' tab. Here you can add as many returns as you wish while adding your description.
